name: Howard GIBSON, Petitioner v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of March, 2012, the “Letter Petition for Reinstatement of Appeal Rights” is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

39 A.3d 994
